long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wield the power of the Thunder God with our Thor-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A bold interface inspired by Thor’s electrifying presence and Asgardian heritage.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that channels the might and precision of the God of Thunder.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into thrilling, action-packed games inspired by Thor.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features worthy of the mighty Mjolnir.
